original_text: Abram said to Lot, ‘We must not quarrel with each other. Your shepherds and my shepherds must not quarrel with each other. Remember that we belong to the same family.
korean_text: 아브람이 롯에게 이르되 우리는 한 친족이라 나나 너나 내 목자나 네 목자나 서로 다투게 하지 말자

sentences.original_text: We must not quarrel with each other
must not quarrel with each other
Remember that we belong to the same family
